description: Contains the assembled contigs derived from the WGS raw reads.

checksums.description: One or more checksums used to ensure file integrity.

date.description: Date on which the assembly was generated.

format.description: The file format of the sequence file.

format_doc.description: URL for documentation of file format.

sop.description: URL for documentation of assembly protocol.

assembler.description: The software and version used to generate the assembly.

assembly_name.description: Name/version of the assembly provided by the submitter.

sequence_type.description: Specifies whether the file contains peptide or nucleotide data.

size.description: The size of the file in bytes.

study.description: One of the 3 studies that are part of the iHMP.

tags.description: An array of descriptive strings to make the node 'taggable'.

urls.description: An array of URL from where the file can be obtained, http, ftp, fasp, etc...
